channel.title: Enabling UPnP for portforwarding
channel.description:
I have a Linksys WRT120n wireless router, how would I enable UPnP on my router? I can't go to the web interface because the pw "admin" doesn't work, and the router won't reset to factory defaults when I hold the reset button for 30 seconds or 60 seconds.
I want to do this so it can automatically portforward so I can use a normal IP for my server instead of Hamachi.

item.title: Enabling UPnP for portforwarding
item.dc:creator: @bigbaddrag bigbaddrag
item.description:
@bigbaddrag wrote:

I have a Linksys WRT120n wireless router, how would I enable UPnP on my router?
I can’t go to the web interface because the pw “admin” doesn’t work, and the router won’t reset to factory defaults when I hold the reset button for 30 seconds or 60 seconds.

I want to do this so it can automatically portforward so I can use a normal IP for my server instead of Hamachi.
